assets.name: processing_api
assets.content:
<script runat="server">
  Platform.Load("core", "1.1.1");
  Platform.Response.SetResponseHeader("Access-Control-Allow-Origin", "*");
  Platform.Response.SetResponseHeader('Strict-Transport-Security', 'max-age=200');
  Platform.Response.SetResponseHeader('X-XSS-Protection', '1; mode=block');
  Platform.Response.SetResponseHeader('X-Frame-Options', 'Deny');
  Platform.Response.SetResponseHeader('X-Content-Type-Options', 'nosniff');
  Platform.Response.SetResponseHeader('Referrer-Policy', 'strict-origin-when-cross-origin');
  Platform.Response.SetResponseHeader('Content-Security-Policy', "default-src 'self'");

  var postData = Platform.Request.GetPostData();
  var postJSON = Platform.Function.ParseJSON(postData);

  var action = Platform.Request.GetQueryStringParameter('action');
  var payload = Platform.Request.GetQueryStringParameter('payload');

  var brand = Platform.Request.GetQueryStringParameter('brand');
  var locale = Platform.Request.GetQueryStringParameter('locale');

  var configPath = 'Content Builder\\Basetime Preference Center\\configurations' + '\\ ' + brand + '\\ ' + locale
  var applicationConfigurationPath = configPath + '\\app_configuration'
  applicationConfigurationPath = applicationConfigurationPath.replace(/(?<=\\)\ /g, '')

  var applicationConfiguration = Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(applicationConfigurationPath)
  var applicationConfigurationJSON = Platform.Function.ParseJSON(applicationConfiguration)
  var map = applicationConfigurationJSON.map;

  var preferenceCenterDataExtensionExternalKey = map.data_extension.preferenceCenterExternalKey;

  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(map.content_block.ssjs.wsProxy)
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(map.content_block.ssjs.utils)

  var fns = {
    utils: util(),
    wsProxy: wsProxy()
  }

  var res = '';
  var reqConfig = {};

  //Begin API Control Block
  //Run specific set of code/functions based on the 'action' parameter
  //After code is finished, the 'response' function returns the output and 'break' stops the processing
  switch (action) {
    case 'testUnsub':
      var postJSON = {
        "postData": [
          [
            {
              "Name": "preferenceUpdatedDate",
              "Value": "2022-07-20T21:17:46.209Z"
            },
            {
              "Name": "preference",
              "Value": "unsubscribe"
            },
            {
              "Name": "subscriberId",
              "Value": 484239505
            },
            {
              "Name": "emailAddress",
              "Value": "tony.zupancic@avagate.com"
            },
            {
              "Name": "channel",
              "Value": "email"
            }
          ]
        ],
        "logUnsubEvent": {
          "unsubscribe": true,
          "emailAddress": "tony.zupancic@avagate.com",
          "subscriberKey": "tony.zupancic@avagate.com",
          "subscriberId": 484239505,
          "jobId": 0
        }
      }

      var unsubEvent;
      var logUnsubEvent = postJSON.logUnsubEvent;
      var allSubscribersListID = fns.utils.getAllSubscribersListID(fns)
      var subscriberCurrentStatus = fns.utils.getSubscriberStatus(logUnsubEvent.subscriberId, fns)

      if (applicationConfigurationJSON.action_toggles.unsubscribe === true) {
        logUnsubEvent.listId = allSubscribersListID;
        unsubEvent = fns.utils.toggleUnsubscribe(logUnsubEvent, subscriberCurrentStatus, fns)
      }

      res = {
        allSubscribersListID: allSubscribersListID,
        subscriberCurrentStatus: subscriberCurrentStatus,
        logUnsubEvent: logUnsubEvent,
        unsubEvent: unsubEvent
      }

      break;
    case 'submitPreferenceForm':
      var updateData = postJSON.postData;
      var logUnsubEvent = postJSON.logUnsubEvent || null;
      var unsubscribe = logUnsubEvent.unsubscribe;
      var allSubscribersListID = fns.utils.getAllSubscribersListID(fns)
      var subscriberCurrentStatus = fns.utils.getSubscriberStatus(logUnsubEvent.subscriberId, fns)

      // add All Subscribers ListID to UnsubEvent Object
      logUnsubEvent.listId = allSubscribersListID;

      var payload = [];

      for (var u = 0; u < updateData.length; u++) {
        var update = updateData[u];
        payload.push({
          CustomerKey: preferenceCenterDataExtensionExternalKey,
          Properties: update
        })
      }

      //update item
      reqConfig = {
        soapObjName: "DataExtensionObject",
        options: {
          SaveOptions: [{
            PropertyName: "*",
            SaveAction: "UpdateAdd"
          }]
        },
        payload: payload
      }
      var updatePreferences = fns.wsProxy.update(reqConfig);

      var unsubEvent;
      if (applicationConfigurationJSON.action_toggles.unsubscribe === true) {
        unsubEvent = fns.utils.toggleUnsubscribe(logUnsubEvent, subscriberCurrentStatus, fns)
      }

      res = updatePreferences;
      break;


    case 'getCurrentPreferences':
      var preferences;
      var preferenceRequest;

      reqConfig = {
        dataExtensionKey: preferenceCenterDataExtensionExternalKey,
        cols: [],
        filter: {
          Property: "subscriberId",
          SimpleOperator: "equals",
          Value: postJSON.subscriberId
        }
      };

      preferenceRequest = fns.utils.getDERecords(reqConfig, fns);

      if (preferenceRequest.Status === 'OK') {
        // Add Record if it does not exist
        if (preferenceRequest.Results.length === 0) {
          var channels = postJSON.channels;
          var payload = [];
          var updateConfig;

          for (var c = 0; c < channels.length; c++) {
            var channel = channels[c];

            payload.push({
              CustomerKey: preferenceCenterDataExtensionExternalKey,
              Properties: [
                {
                  Name: 'subscriberId',
                  Value: postJSON.subscriberId
                },
                {
                  Name: 'emailAddress',
                  Value: postJSON.emailAddress
                },
                {
                  Name: 'channel',
                  Value: channel
                }
              ]
            })
          }

          //update item
          updateConfig = {
            soapObjName: "DataExtensionObject",
            options: {
              SaveOptions: [{
                PropertyName: "*",
                SaveAction: "UpdateAdd"
              }]
            },
            payload: payload
          }

          var addRecords = fns.wsProxy.update(updateConfig);
          preferenceRequest = fns.utils.getDERecords(reqConfig, fns)
        }

        preferences = fns.utils.formatResult(preferenceRequest.Results, 'Properties')

        res = {
          Status: 'OK',
          Results: preferences
        }
      } else {
        res = preferenceRequest;
      }

      break;
  };

  fns.utils.response(res)

</script>

assets.name: app_html
assets.content:
<v-app>
  <v-main>
    <v-row overflow="hidden">
      <v-col cols="12">
        <branding-bar @update-dark-mode="onUpdateDarkMode" :application-configuration="applicationConfiguration" :dark-mode="darkMode" :branding="branding"></branding-bar>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
    <v-row v-show="authorized">
      <v-col cols="2">
        <channel-drawer @update-channel-selection="onUpdateChannelSelection" :channels="channels" :branding="branding"
          :preference-options="preferenceOptions"></channel-drawer>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="10">
        <preference-form @submit-preference-form="onSubmitPreferenceForm" :channels="channels" :subscriber-preferences="subscriber.preferences" :form-submitting="formSubmitting"
          :branding="branding" :preference-options="preferenceOptions" :channel-selection="channelSelection">
        </preference-form>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
    <v-row v-show="!authorized">
      <unauthorized-user :branding="branding" :unauthorized="preferenceOptions.unauthorized">
      </unauthorized-user>
    </v-row>
    <v-row>
      <legal :branding="branding" :legal="preferenceOptions.legal">
      </legal>
    </v-row>
  </v-main>
</v-app>

assets.name: app_js
_component_imports
channel_drawer
assets.content:
/* What is this component? */ Vue.component('channel-drawer', { props: { preferenceOptions: Object, branding: Object, channels: Array }, methods: { getChannelIcon: function (channel, preferenceOptions) { return this.preferenceOptions['channels'][channel]['icon'] } }, data() { return { right: null, } }, template: `
{{ getChannelIcon(channel, this.preferenceOptions) }} {{ channel }}
` })

submit_button_animation
assets.content:
<style>
  .custom-loader {
    animation: loader 1s infinite;
    display: flex;
  }
  @-moz-keyframes loader {
    from {
      transform: rotate(0);
    }
    to {
      transform: rotate(360deg);
    }
  }
  @-webkit-keyframes loader {
    from {
      transform: rotate(0);
    }
    to {
      transform: rotate(360deg);
    }
  }
  @-o-keyframes loader {
    from {
      transform: rotate(0);
    }
    to {
      transform: rotate(360deg);
    }
  }
  @keyframes loader {
    from {
      transform: rotate(0);
    }
    to {
      transform: rotate(360deg);
    }
  }
</style>

assets.name: wsProxy
assets.content:
<script runat="server">
  Platform.Load("core", "1.1");

  function wsProxy() {
    var prox = new Script.Util.WSProxy();
    var fn = {};

    /*******************************
     * @config {<Object>}
     * @continueRequest {Boolean}
     * @return {Array}
     ******************************/
    fn.retrieve = function (config, continueRequest) {

      var reqID;
      var moreData = true;
      var continueRequest = continueRequest ? continueRequest : false;
      var obj = config.soapObjName ? config.soapObjName : null;
      var opts = config.opts ? config.opts : {};
      var props = config.props ? config.props : {};
      var filter = config.filter ? config.filter : {};
      var cols = config.cols ? config.cols : null;
      var mid = config.mid ? config.mid : null;
      // prox = mid ? util.proxyContext(prox, mid) : prox;

      if (!config) { return 'configuration required'; }
      if (!obj) { return 'SOAP object is required'; }

      var resultsOut = [];

      var data = prox.retrieve(obj, cols, filter, opts, props)

      return data

    } // end retrieve

    /*******************************
     * @config {Object}
     * @return {Object}
     ******************************/
    fn.update = function (config) {
      var obj = config.soapObjName ? config.soapObjName : null;
      var payload = config.payload ? config.payload : null;
      var options = config.options ? config.options : null;
      var mid = config.mid ? config.mid : null;
      // prox = mid ? utils.proxyContext(prox, mid) : prox;

      if (!config) { return 'configuration required'; }
      if (!obj) { return 'SOAP object is required'; }
      if (!payload) { return 'payload is required'; }

      var batch = fns.utils.isArray(payload)

      if (batch) {
        var res = prox.updateBatch(obj, payload, options);
      } else {
        var res = prox.updateItem(obj, payload, options);
      }

      return res;
    } // end update


    return fn
  }

</script>
